ygData.subject: Re: POST-only resources

* Stefan Tilkov <stefan.tilkov@...> [2007-11-08 17:50]:
> I prefer to model something like this as two collection
> resources -- e.g. /cancelled-orders and /picked-orders --
> with the state change as a "move" from one to the other.

That fits nicely on the face of it… but it seems tricky to
implement in HTTP to me. How is the move operation initiated?
Do you adopt MOVE from WebDAV? Or do you use another verb – if
so, to what URI and with what representation? And how is this
communicated in hypermedia?

Regards,
-- 
Aristotle Pagaltzis // <http://plasmasturm.org/>
